1. to sneak off; to slip away
2. (sports) to jump the gun; to make a false start
3. (fig.) to jump the gun; to start doing sth before it's allowed
4. (of a movie, game etc) to be leaked before the official release

tóu /tou2/
1. head; hair style; the top; end; beginning or end; a stub; remnant; chief; boss; side; aspect; first; leading; classifier for pigs or livestock
2. to throw (sth in a specific direction: ball, javelin, grenade etc)
3. to cast (a ballot)
4. to cast (a glance, a shadow etc)
5. to put in (money for investment, a coin to operate a slot machine)
6. to send (a letter, a manuscript etc)
7. to throw oneself into (a river, a well etc to commit suicide)
8. to go to; to seek refuge; to place oneself into the hands of
9. (coll.) to rinse (clothes) in water
10. dice
11. short board; plank

1. (bound form) to penetrate; to seep through
2. to tell secretly; to leak
3. thoroughly; through and through
4. to appear; to show
tòu /tou4/
tòuguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. (bound form) to penetrate; to seep through
2. to tell secretly; to leak
3. thoroughly; through and through
4. to appear; to show
tòu /tou4/
tòule, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. (bound form) to penetrate; to seep through
2. to tell secretly; to leak
3. thoroughly; through and through
4. to appear; to show

tuìsuō /tui4suo1/

tuìsuō /tui4suo1/
tuìsuōzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
■ to shrink back; to cower
tuìsuō /tui4suo1/
tuìsuōguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to shrink back; to cower
tuìsuō /tui4suo1/
tuìsuōle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
■ to shrink back; to cower

tuō /tuo1/
1. to shed; to take off; to escape; to get away from
2. to drag; to tow; to trail; to hang down; to mop (the floor); to delay; to drag on
3. to hold up in one's hand; to support with one's palm
4. sth serving as a support: a prop, a rest (e.g. arm rest)
5. (bound form) a shill
6. to ask; to beg; to entrust
7. torr (unit of pressure)
8. to trust; to entrust; to be entrusted with; to act as trustee
9. nonstandard simplified variant of »tuō«
10. (literary) to entrust
11. to let drop
12. camel; Taiwan pr. »luò«
tuō /tuo1/
tuōzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to shed; to take off; to escape; to get away from
2. to drag; to tow; to trail; to hang down; to mop (the floor); to delay; to drag on
3. to hold up in one's hand; to support with one's palm
4. sth serving as a support: a prop, a rest (e.g. arm rest)
5. (bound form) a shill
6. to ask; to beg; to entrust
7. torr (unit of pressure)
8. to trust; to entrust; to be entrusted with; to act as trustee
9. nonstandard simplified variant of »tuō«
10. (literary) to entrust
11. to let drop
12. camel; Taiwan pr. »luò«
tuō /tuo1/
tuōguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to shed; to take off; to escape; to get away from
2. to drag; to tow; to trail; to hang down; to mop (the floor); to delay; to drag on
3. to hold up in one's hand; to support with one's palm
4. sth serving as a support: a prop, a rest (e.g. arm rest)
5. (bound form) a shill
6. to ask; to beg; to entrust
7. torr (unit of pressure)
8. to trust; to entrust; to be entrusted with; to act as trustee
9. nonstandard simplified variant of »tuō«
10. (literary) to entrust
11. to let drop
12. camel; Taiwan pr. »luò«
tuō /tuo1/
tuōle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. to shed; to take off; to escape; to get away from
2. to drag; to tow; to trail; to hang down; to mop (the floor); to delay; to drag on
3. to hold up in one's hand; to support with one's palm
4. sth serving as a support: a prop, a rest (e.g. arm rest)
5. (bound form) a shill
6. to ask; to beg; to entrust
7. torr (unit of pressure)
8. to trust; to entrust; to be entrusted with; to act as trustee
9. nonstandard simplified variant of »tuō«
10. (literary) to entrust
11. to let drop
12. camel; Taiwan pr. »luò«

tuōpí /tuo1pi2/

■ (of paint etc) to peel off; to flake off; (of an insect or snake etc) to molt; (of skin) to peel off due to hard labor, blistering or sunburn etc; (fig.) to go through a grueling experience
tuōpí /tuo1pi2/
tuōpíle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

tuó /tuo2/
1. mound; heap; lump
2. classifier for small mounds (e.g. animal scat deposits)
3. (of noodles, jiaozi »jiǎozi« etc) to stick together; to form a clump
4. (phonetic); declivity; steep bank
5. hump or hunchbacked; camel
6. steelyard weight; stone roller; to polish jade with an emery wheel
7. to carry on one's back
8. tearful; to branch (of river)
9. ostrich
10. carry on the back
11. beautiful
12. main beam of roof
13. sack; tube open at both ends; (onom.) footsteps
14. braid on a robe
15. cheat
16. to stumble; to waste time
17. flushed (from drinking)
18. bank; hillside
19. (horse)
20. catfish; a kind of small fish; Chinese alligator

tū /tu1/
1. to dash; to move forward quickly; to bulge; to protrude; to break through; to rush out; sudden; Taiwan pr. »tú«
2. bald (lacking hair or feathers)
3. barren; bare; denuded
4. blunt (lacking a point)
5. (of a piece of writing) unsatisfactory; lacking something
6. to stick out; protruding; convex; male (connector etc)
7. Taiwan pr. »tú«
8. bald
9. radish; daikon; Taiwan pr. »tú«

tú /tu2/
1. diagram; picture; drawing; chart; map; CL: zhāng
2. to plan; to scheme; to attempt; to pursue; to seek
3. to apply (paint etc); to smear; to daub; to blot out; to scribble; to scrawl; (literary) mud; street
4. (bound form) disciple; apprentice; believer; (derog.) wrongdoer (as in »piàntú« "swindler" or »pàntú« "traitor" etc)
5. (bound form) on foot
6. (bound form) bare; empty
7. (bound form) to no avail; in vain
8. (bound form) merely; just; only
9. (bound form) prison sentence
10. way; route; road
11. to slaughter (animals for food); to massacre
12. thistle; common sowthistle (Sonchus oleraceus); bitter (taste); cruel; flowering grass in profusion
13. a kind of jade
14. name of a mountain
15. be injured; ill (of animals)
16. sticky rice
17. fat (of pigs)
18. yeast
tú /tu2/
túzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

tǔ /tu3/
1. to spit; to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc); to say; to pour out (one's grievances)
2. earth; dust; clay; local; indigenous; crude opium; unsophisticated; one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments »bāyīn«
3. thorium (chemistry)
tǔ /tu3/
tǔzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to spit; to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc); to say; to pour out (one's grievances)
2. earth; dust; clay; local; indigenous; crude opium; unsophisticated; one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments »bāyīn«
3. thorium (chemistry)
tǔ /tu3/
tǔguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to spit; to send out (silk from a silkworm, bolls from cotton flowers etc); to say; to pour out (one's grievances)
2. earth; dust; clay; local; indigenous; crude opium; unsophisticated; one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments »bāyīn«
3. thorium (chemistry)
tǔ /tu3/
tǔle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

2. earth; dust; clay; local; indigenous; crude opium; unsophisticated; one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments »bāyīn«

■ stage name of Cyndi Wang; see »Wáng Jūnrú«
Wáng Xīzhī /Wang2 Xi1 zhi1/*
■ Wang Xizhi (303-361), famous calligrapher of Eastern Jin, known as the sage of calligraphy
Wáng Xuǎn /Wang2 Xuan3/*
■ Wang Xuan (1937-2006), Chinese printing industry innovator
Wáng Yángmíng /Wang2 Yang2 ming2/*
■ Wang Yangming (1472-1529), Ming dynasty Neo-Confucian philosopher, influential in the School of Mind »xīnxué«
Wáng Yáng Lú Luò /Wang2 Yang2 Lu2 Luo4/*
■ abbr. for Wang Bo »Wáng Bó«, Yang Jiong »Yáng Jiǒng«, Lu Zhaolin »Lú Zhàolín«, and Luo Binwang »Luò Bīnwáng«, the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang
Wáng Yīng /Wang2 Ying1/*
■ Wang Ying (character in the "Water Margin")
Wáng Yǐng /Wang2 Ying3/*
■ Wayne Wang (1949-), Chinese US film director
Wáng Yì /Wang2 Yi4/*
■ Wang Yi (1953-), PRC foreign minister (2013-) and state councilor (2018-)
Wáng Yìfū /Wang2 Yi4 fu1/*
■ Wang Yifu (1960-), male PRC pistol shooter and Olympic medalist
Wáng Yǒngmín /Wang2 Yong3 min2/*
■ Wang Yongmin (1943-), inventor of the five stroke input method »wǔbǐshūrùfǎ«
Wáng Yǔchēng /Wang2 Yu3 cheng1/*
■ Wang Yucheng (954-1001) Song dynasty literary figure
Wáng Zhāojūn /Wang2 Zhao1 jun1/*
■ Wang Zhaojun (52-19 BC), famous beauty at the court of Han emperor Yuan »Hàn Yuándì«, one of the four legendary beauties »sìdàměinǚ«
Wáng Zhèn /Wang2 Zhen4/*
■ Wang Zhen (1908-1993), Chinese political figure
Wáng Zhìzhì /Wang2 Zhi4 zhi4/*
■ Wang Zhizhi (1977-), former Chinese basketball player
Wáng Zhù /Wang2 Zhu4/*
■ Wang Zhu (-c. 990), Song calligrapher and writer
Wáng Zǔxián /Wang2 Zu3 xian2/*
■ Joey Wong (1967-), Taiwanese actress

2. busy season; peak period; see also »dànjì«

wēi /wei1/
1. tiny; miniature; slightly; profound; abtruse; to decline; one millionth part of; micro-; Taiwan pr. »wéi«
2. power; might; prestige
3. danger; to endanger; Taiwan pr. »wéi«
4. Osmunda regalis, a species of fern; Taiwan pr. »wéi«
5. high, lofty; precipitous
6. to cuddle
7. to simmer; to roast in ashes
8. lofty; towering; Taiwan pr. »wéi«
9. (dialect) to bend (a long and thin object)
10. the pivots, at the top and bottom of a Chinese door, on which the door turns
11. cove; bay; a bend or nook in the hills; the curve of a bow
12. drizzle; fine rain
13. light rain
14. three-cornered stove
15. luxuriant
16. bay; cove

Wēnzhōu Shì /Wen1zhou1 Shi4/
■ Wenzhou, prefecture-level city in Zhejiang Province »Zhèjiāng Shěng«
wēn'ǎi /wen1 ai3/*
■ gentle and kind
Wēn Jiābǎo /Wen1 Jia1 bao3/*
■ Wen Jiabao (1942-), Premier of PRC from 2003-2013
wéi /wei2/
1. as (in the capacity of); to take sth as; to act as; to serve as; to behave as; to become; to be; to do; by (in the passive voice)
2. hello (when answering the phone)
3. only; alone; -ism (in Chinese, a prefix, often combined with a suffix such as »zhǔyì« or »lùn«, e.g. »wéilǐlùn«, rationalism)
4. to preserve; to maintain; to hold together; dimension; vitamin (abbr. for »wéishēngsù«)
5. to encircle; to surround; all around; to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
6. to disobey; to violate; to separate; to go against
7. soft leather
8. -ism; only
9. mast
10. enclosure
11. curtain; screen
12. curtain; women's apartment; tent
13. door to women's room; gate to palace
14. dike
15. to appear displeased; beautiful
16. high and uneven
17. rocky
18. to flow back (of water)
19. still water
20. name of a river
21. ancient yak of southeast China, also known as »kuíniú«
22. place in Henan province
23. spade
24. a kind of shad with a head like a sturgeon
wéi /wei2/
wéizhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. as (in the capacity of); to take sth as; to act as; to serve as; to behave as; to become; to be; to do; by (in the passive voice)
2. hello (when answering the phone)
3. only; alone; -ism (in Chinese, a prefix, often combined with a suffix such as »zhǔyì« or »lùn«, e.g. »wéilǐlùn«, rationalism)
4. to preserve; to maintain; to hold together; dimension; vitamin (abbr. for »wéishēngsù«)
5. to encircle; to surround; all around; to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)
6. to disobey; to violate; to separate; to go against
7. soft leather

22. place in Henan province
23. spade
24. a kind of shad with a head like a sturgeon
wéi /wei2/
wéiguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

wéi /wei2/
wéile, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

2. hello (when answering the phone)

Wéi Yìngwù /Wei2 Ying4wu4/
■ Wei Yingwu (c. 737 - c. 792), Tang dynasty poet
wén /wen2/
1. to hear; news; well-known; famous; reputation; fame; to smell; to sniff at
2. language; culture; writing; formal; literary; gentle; (old) classifier for coins; Kangxi radical 67
3. line; trace; mark; pattern; grain (of wood etc)
4. mosquito
5. veins in jade
6. (Cantonese) to simmer; to cook over a slow fire
7. to look down
8. wen xiang, Henan province
9. multicolored clouds
wén /wen2/
wénzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

2. language; culture; writing; formal; literary; gentle; (old) classifier for coins; Kangxi radical 67
3. line; trace; mark; pattern; grain (of wood etc)
4. mosquito
5. veins in jade
6. (Cantonese) to simmer; to cook over a slow fire
7. to look down
8. wen xiang, Henan province
9. multicolored clouds
wén /wen2/
wénguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

2. language; culture; writing; formal; literary; gentle; (old) classifier for coins; Kangxi radical 67
3. line; trace; mark; pattern; grain (of wood etc)
4. mosquito
5. veins in jade
6. (Cantonese) to simmer; to cook over a slow fire
7. to look down
8. wen xiang, Henan province
9. multicolored clouds
wén /wen2/
wénle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

wénrén /wen2ren2/
1. cultivated individual; scholar; literati
2. famous person
wénrénxiāngqīng /wen2 ren2 xiang1 qing1/*

Wénshān Qū /Wen2shan1 Qu1/
■ Wenshan District in Taipei »Táiběi Shì«, Taiwan

wěi /wei3/
1. yes
2. tail; remainder; remnant; extremity; sixth of the 28 constellations; classifier for fish
3. big; large; great
4. false; fake; forged; bogus; (prefix) pseudo-; Taiwan pr. »wèi«
5. to entrust; to cast aside; to shift (blame etc); to accumulate; roundabout; winding; dejected; listless; committee member; council; end; actually; certainly
6. to wither; to drop; to decline; spiritless; Taiwan pr. »wēi«
7. little tuna; Euthynnus alletteratus
8. atrophy
9. latitude; woof (horizontal thread in weaving); weft
10. reed; rush; Phragmites communis
11. aft
12. resolute
13. mound; embankment; the earthen altar to the god of the soil
14. ugly; to indulge oneself
15. the bright shining of the sun
16. name of a river
17. glowing; bright; brilliant
18. humble; rustic; plentiful
19. (reddish jade); precious; rare
20. a bruise or contusion
21. rocky; stony
22. (arch.) type of grass
23. to shirk; to give excuses
24. eminent; lofty
25. correct; right
26. gorgeous
27. easeful carriage of one's head
28. be bent; crooked (of bones)

Wèi /Wei4/
1. surname Wei; vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present-day Henan and Hebei Provinces
2. surname Wei; name of a vassal state of the Zhou dynasty from 661 BC in Shanxi, one of the Seven Hero Warring States; Wei state, founded by Cao Cao »Cáo Cāo«, one of the Three Kingdoms after the Han dynasty; the Wei dynasty 221-265; Wei Prefecture or Wei County at various times in history
3. the Wei River in Shaanxi through the Guanzhong Plain »Guānzhōng Píngyuán«

wō /wo1/
1. (onom.) cry of a rooster (usu. reduplicated); Taiwan pr. »wò«
2. nest; pit or hollow on the human body; lair; den; place; to harbor or shelter; to hold in check; to bend; classifier for litters and broods
3. eddy; whirlpool
4. snail; Taiwan pr. »guā«; see »wōniú«
5. dwarf; Japanese (derog.) (old)
6. used »Lǎowō«
7. to make dirty; to soil
8. to slip and sprain a limb

wǒzuìyùmián /wo3 zui4 yu4 mian2/*

wò /wo4/
1. to hold; to grasp; to clench (one's fist); (bound form) to have in one's control; classifier: a handful
2. fertile; rich; to irrigate; to wash (of river)
3. to lie; to crouch
4. to enrich; to moisten
5. oxime; oximide; -oxil (chemistry)
6. to turn
7. dirty; small-minded
8. constrained
9. tent
10. to soil
11. uncarved jade
wò /wo4/
wòzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to hold; to grasp; to clench (one's fist); (bound form) to have in one's control; classifier: a handful
2. fertile; rich; to irrigate; to wash (of river)
3. to lie; to crouch

7. dirty; small-minded
8. constrained
9. tent
10. to soil
11. uncarved jade
wò /wo4/
wòguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

10. to soil
11. uncarved jade
wò /wo4/

2. without support; helpless

wúyuánguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. to have no opportunity; no way (of doing sth); no chance; no connection; not placed (in a competition); (in pop lyrics) no chance of love, no place to be together etc
2. without support; helpless

wǔ /wu3/
1. five; 5
2. to dance; to wield; to brandish
3. 7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse; ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)
4. martial; military
5. to enclose; to cover with the hand (one's eyes, nose or ears); to cover up (an affair); contrary; to contradict
6. squad of five soldiers; to associate with; five (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
7. disobedient; unfilial
8. to insult; to ridicule; to disgrace
9. numeral 5 in the Suzhou numeral system »Sūzhōumǎzi«
10. equal; well-matched; to violate
11. (used in given names)
12. obstinate, disobedient, intractable
13. flatter; to please
14. small rooms facing or to the side of the main hall or veranda
15. (literary) to have tender affection for; (literary) discouraged; disappointed; (literary) startled
16. to cover
17. river in Henan
18. to oppose; to gore
19. inferior gem; a kind of jade
20. vase; jar
21. obstinate, perverse
wǔ /wu3/
wǔzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. five; 5
2. to dance; to wield; to brandish
3. 7th earthly branch: 11 a.m.-1 p.m., noon, 5th solar month (6th June-6th July), year of the Horse; ancient Chinese compass point: 180° (south)
4. martial; military

8. to insult; to ridicule; to disgrace

10. equal; well-matched; to violate

13. flatter; to please

19. inferior gem; a kind of jade
20. vase; jar

wǔxíng /wu3 xing2/*
1. five phases of Chinese philosophy: wood , fire , earth , metal , water
2. imperial five punishments of feudal China, up to Han times: tattooing characters on the forehead »mò«, cutting off the nose »yì«, amputation of one or both feet »yuè«, castration »gōng«, execution »dàpì«; Han dynasty onwards: whipping »chī«, beating the legs and buttocks with rough thorns »zhàng«, forced labor »tú«, exile or banishment »liú«, capital punishment »sǐ«

Wǔ Dīng /Wu3 Ding1/*

■ "Collection of the Most Important Military Techniques", book published in 1044 during the Northern Song Dynasty
Wǔ Liáng /Wu3 Liang2/*
■ the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang (314-376), Later Liang (386-403), Northern Liang (398-439), Southern Liang »Nán Liáng« (397-414), Western Liang (400-421)
Wǔ Rén Mùbēijì /Wu3 Ren2 Mu4bei1ji4/
■ Five Men's Tombstone Inscription, an essay by Zhang Pu »Zhāng Pǔ« commemorating five martyrs who died resisting the tyranny of Wei Zhongxian »Wèi Zhōngxián« during the late Ming dynasty
Wǔ Shē /Wu3 She1/
■ Wu She (-522 BC), father of Wu Zixu »Wǔ Zǐxū«, official of the state of Chu, executed after being falsely accused by King Ping of Chu
Wǔ Shèng /Wu3 Sheng4/*
■ the Saint of War (i.e. the deified Guan Yu »Guān Yǔ«)
Wǔ Shìhuò /Wu3 Shi4 huo4/*
■ Wu Shihuo (7th century), father of Tang empress Wu Zetian
Wǔ Sōng /Wu3 Song1/*
■ Wu Song, a heroic outlaw of Liangshan Marsh in the classic novel Water Margin »Shuǐhǔ Zhuàn«, whose exploits include killing a tiger with his bare hands
Wǔ Tíngfāng /Wu3 Ting2 fang1/*
■ Wu Tingfang (1842-1922), diplomat and lawyer
Wǔ Zétiān /Wu3 Ze2 tian1/*
■ Wu Zetian (624-705), Tang empress, reigned 690-705
Wǔ Zǐxū /Wu3 Zi3xu1/
■ Wu Zixu (-484 BC), Chu-born strategist for Wu. After the King of Chu executed his family, he fled to Wu and masterminded Wu's invasion of Chu (506 BC), destroying its capital in a campaign that doubled as personal vengeance.
wù /wu4/
1. (bound form) thing; (literary) the outside world as distinct from oneself; people other than oneself
2. to hate; to loathe; ashamed; to fear; to slander
3. mistake; error; to miss; to harm; to delay; to neglect; mistakenly
4. fog; mist; CL: cháng, zhèn
5. do not
6. affair; business; matter; to be engaged in; to attend to; by all means
7. (bound form) low area within a surrounding barrier; (literary) small castle; fort
8. to comprehend; to apprehend; to become aware
9. to meet (socially)
10. fifth of the ten Heavenly Stems »shítiāngān«; fifth in order; letter "E" or Roman "V" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc; penta
11. (bound form) to rush about; to strive for
12. (literary) rising to a height; towering
13. (literary) bald; bare
14. (literary) still; yet
15. duck
16. uncomfortable; unsteady
17. beautiful
18. to awake from sleep
19. bare hill
20. to impede; to delay
21. to shake; to sway
22. low stool
23. abstruse; profound
24. to warm sth up
25. (flat) mole
26. fluorene C13H10; (old) name of an edible wild plant
27. to disobey; contrary; against; to go against; to violate; obscure character, possibly variant of »è«
28. recalcitrant; to encounter
29. -plated; to plate
wù /wu4/
wùzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.

wù /wu4/
wùle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.

3. mistake; error; to miss; to harm; to delay; to neglect; mistakenly

20. to manner of dancing; to walk around

23. wild onions or leeks

xiānfēnggǔlàngguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
■ to raise a storm; to stir up trouble; to instigate
xiānfēnggǔlàng /xian1 feng1 gu3 lang4/*

xiānfù /xian1 fu4/*
■ deceased father; my late father
xiāng /xiang1/
1. each other; one another; mutually; fret on the neck of a pipa »pípa« (a fret on the soundboard is called a »pǐn«)
2. box; trunk; chest
3. fragrant; sweet smelling; aromatic; savory or appetizing; (to eat) with relish; (of sleep) sound; perfume or spice; joss or incense stick; CL: gēn
4. to inlay; to embed; ridge; border
5. box (in theater); side room; side
6. country or countryside; native place; home village or town; township (PRC administrative unit)
7. (literary) to assist
8. to stroll; to ramble
9. inner lining of wooden utensils; component beam used in building construction; species of oak tree with medicinal bark (old)
10. ornaments
11. light yellow color
12. cord to hold up sleeves
13. hashed beef; soup
14. see , feather cockscomb (Celosia argentea)
15. aromatic herb used for seasoning
16. country; village
17. (literary) to run friskily (of a horse); to raise; to hold high

xiāo /xiao1/
1. to diminish; to subside
2. to consume; to reduce
3. to idle away (the time)
4. (after »bù« or »zhǐ« or »hé« etc) to need; to require; to take
5. to peel with a knife; to pare; to cut (a ball at tennis etc)
6. night
7. xiao, a vertical bamboo flute
8. to melt (metal)
9. to cancel; to annul
10. to sell
11. to expend; to spend
12. pin; bolt
13. to fasten with a pin or bolt
14. saltpeter; to tan (leather)
15. (old) Chinese mugwort; (bound form) desolate; dreary
16. clamor
17. owl; valiant; trafficker
18. firmament; heaven
19. a cry of alarm; querulous
20. vapor; steam
21. (of water) deep and clear
22. good horse; valiant
23. voice of anger; vast; spacious
24. boastful; bombastic
25. (archaic) hollow of a tree; (literary) empty; hollow
26. a type of big tree (archaic)
27. sound of rain and wind
28. to boil or fumigate
29. the scream or roar of a tiger; to intimidate; to scare
30. dog
31. asthma; difficulty in breathing
32. raw silk
33. roar of a tiger
34. (onom.) sound of arrows
35. owl (order Strigiformes)
xiāo /xiao1/
xiāozhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. to diminish; to subside
2. to consume; to reduce
3. to idle away (the time)
4. (after »bù« or »zhǐ« or »hé« etc) to need; to require; to take
5. to peel with a knife; to pare; to cut (a ball at tennis etc)
6. night
7. xiao, a vertical bamboo flute
8. to melt (metal)
9. to cancel; to annul
10. to sell
11. to expend; to spend
12. pin; bolt
13. to fasten with a pin or bolt
14. saltpeter; to tan (leather)
15. (old) Chinese mugwort; (bound form) desolate; dreary
16. clamor
17. owl; valiant; trafficker
18. firmament; heaven
19. a cry of alarm; querulous
20. vapor; steam
21. (of water) deep and clear
22. good horse; valiant
23. voice of anger; vast; spacious
24. boastful; bombastic
25. (archaic) hollow of a tree; (literary) empty; hollow
26. a type of big tree (archaic)
27. sound of rain and wind
28. to boil or fumigate
29. the scream or roar of a tiger; to intimidate; to scare
30. dog
31. asthma; difficulty in breathing
32. raw silk
33. roar of a tiger
34. (onom.) sound of arrows
35. owl (order Strigiformes)
xiāo /xiao1/
xiāoguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.

xiāshuō /xia1 shuo1/*

xián /xian2/
1. enclosure; idle; unoccupied; leisure
2. idle; unoccupied; leisure
3. to dislike; suspicion; resentment; enmity; abbr. for »xiánfàn«, criminal suspect
4. all; everyone; each; widespread; harmonious
5. salted; salty; stingy; miserly
6. bow string; string of musical instrument; watchspring; chord (segment of curve); hypotenuse; CL: gēn
7. side of a ship or an aircraft
8. worthy or virtuous person; honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
9. bit (of a bridle); to hold in the mouth; to harbor (feelings); to link; to accept; rank; title
10. saliva
11. elegant; refined; to be skilled at
12. bow string; string of musical instrument; watch spring; chord (straight line joining two points on a curve); hypotenuse
13. a kind of vegetable
14. (literary) cruel; ruthless
15. (literary) dark red; black
16. composed, contented
17. to pull out (esp. hair or feathers); to pick; to pluck; fig. to extract (lines from a text)
18. epilepsy; insanity
19. millipede
20. to bring into accord; sincerity
21. silver pheasant (Phasianus nycthemerus); silver pheasant badge worn by civil officials of the 5th grade

xiǎn /xian3/
1. danger; dangerous; rugged
2. to make visible; to reveal; prominent; conspicuous; (prefix) phanero-
3. few; rare
4. moss; lichen; moss on damp walls; used erroneously for
5. shining metal; (old) the 16th of the month (abbreviation used in telegrams)
6. name of an ancient state
7. precipitous; rugged
8. curtain at front of carriage
9. conflagration
10. a kind of dog with a long snout; see »Xiǎnyǔn«
11. to hunt in autumn (archaic)
12. bamboo brush for utensils
13. basket clam (clam of family Corbiculidae); (esp.) Corbicula leana »zhēnxiǎn«
14. barefooted
15. leather girth on horse
xiǎn /xian3/
xiǎnzhe, with the aspect particle -zhe marking a continuous state or ongoing action.
1. danger; dangerous; rugged
2. to make visible; to reveal; prominent; conspicuous; (prefix) phanero-
3. few; rare
4. moss; lichen; moss on damp walls; used erroneously for
5. shining metal; (old) the 16th of the month (abbreviation used in telegrams)
6. name of an ancient state
7. precipitous; rugged
8. curtain at front of carriage
9. conflagration
10. a kind of dog with a long snout; see »Xiǎnyǔn«
11. to hunt in autumn (archaic)
12. bamboo brush for utensils
13. basket clam (clam of family Corbiculidae); (esp.) Corbicula leana »zhēnxiǎn«
14. barefooted
15. leather girth on horse
xiǎn /xian3/
xiǎnguo, with the aspect particle -guo marking that something has been experienced before.
1. danger; dangerous; rugged
2. to make visible; to reveal; prominent; conspicuous; (prefix) phanero-
3. few; rare
4. moss; lichen; moss on damp walls; used erroneously for
5. shining metal; (old) the 16th of the month (abbreviation used in telegrams)
6. name of an ancient state
7. precipitous; rugged
8. curtain at front of carriage
9. conflagration
10. a kind of dog with a long snout; see »Xiǎnyǔn«
11. to hunt in autumn (archaic)
12. bamboo brush for utensils
13. basket clam (clam of family Corbiculidae); (esp.) Corbicula leana »zhēnxiǎn«
14. barefooted
15. leather girth on horse
xiǎn /xian3/
xiǎnle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
1. danger; dangerous; rugged
2. to make visible; to reveal; prominent; conspicuous; (prefix) phanero-
3. few; rare
4. moss; lichen; moss on damp walls; used erroneously for
5. shining metal; (old) the 16th of the month (abbreviation used in telegrams)
6. name of an ancient state
7. precipitous; rugged
8. curtain at front of carriage
9. conflagration
10. a kind of dog with a long snout; see »Xiǎnyǔn«
11. to hunt in autumn (archaic)
12. bamboo brush for utensils
13. basket clam (clam of family Corbiculidae); (esp.) Corbicula leana »zhēnxiǎn«
14. barefooted
15. leather girth on horse

xiǎobiàn /xiao3bian4/
xiǎobiànle, with the aspect particle -le marking a completed action or a change of state.
